a.  
OAU accepts two (2) 'A' level passes/NCE passes in 
Mathematics and Physics and Chemistry.  
ADSU - same as in Education/Biology  
EKSU accepts a pass in General English at NCE as 
equivalent to 'O' level English Language.  
ABU accepts two (2) 'A' level/NCE/IJMB with 'C' grade. 
BENIN requires NCEmerit inMathematics and one 
(1)Science subject plus three (3) or two (2) 'O' level 
credit passes including English Language at one (1) 
sitting.  
BAUCHI accepts NCE pass with five(5)-years teaching 
experience.  
UMYUK accepts two (2) 'A’ Level credit passes in  
Mathematics and either Physics and/or Chemistry. 
NCE credit in mathematics. Another Science subject is 
also acceptable.  
CALABAR accepts NCE credit or merit in Mathematics 
and one (1) other Science subject.  
 BIU requires in addition to the ‘O’level requirements 
specified, two (2)‘A’ level passes in relevant subjects 
or three (3) NCE merit or ND in relevant programmes.  
UNIOSUN accepts two (2) 'A' level passes including 
Mathematics and any ScienceSubject or NCE merit in 
Mathematics, and one (1) other approved Science or 
Social Science subject.  
IAUED – Same as in Computer Education  
ABSU accepts NCE merit or ND/HND credit in 
Mathematics and one (1) other science subject.  
TASUED accepts two (2) ‘A’ level subjects including 
Mathematics and any Science subject.  Or NCE merit in 
Mathematics, and one (1) other approved Science or 
Social Science subject.  
ND/HND upper credit in Mathematics/Statistics, 
Statistics, Mechanical, Computer a nd Electrical 
Engineering.  
SOSU also accepts   
NCE passes in Mathematics and any other Sciences 
subject;Physics, Biology, Mathematics or Computer
